name: RN apps: File preview gallery - Disable "Enable Public File Links"

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Should not display copy public link button when public file links is disabled
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1.  As admin, go to Site Configuration ➜ Public Links and set,
    • Enable Public File Links = false2. As user, login to app and go to a channel
  2. Post a file, image, or captured photo/video
  3. Tap on the posted file, image, or captured photo/video
inline.expectedResult:
After #4,
  • Verify copy public link button is not displayed on all attachment types (file, image, captured photo, captured video)

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• RN: Gallery should not show the option to copy file public link if not enabled — MM-30858
  • Mobile app: File preview gallery - Disable "Enable Public File Links" does not disable "copy link" button — MM-31685
